H0.text: Which sport was developed in 1895 when the Rugby Union refused to allow professionalism. American Football

H1.text: Which sport was developed in 1895 when the Rugby Union refused to allow professionalism. Australian Rules Football

H2.text: Which sport was developed in 1895 when the Rugby Union refused to allow professionalism. Gaelic Football

H3.text: Which sport was developed in 1895 when the Rugby Union refused to allow professionalism. Rugby 13

A4.text: The Northern Rugby Football Union was formed in 1895 as a result of a schism with the Rugby Football Union over the issue of payments to players.

A5.text: The sport organised by the Rugby Football League became distinct from rugby union due to rule changes initiated by the Northern Union in the late 19th and early 20th centuries.
